Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 在文件系统'%1'创建快照'%2'成功，快照保留天数'%3'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' create snapshot '%2' success,expiration date: '%3'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 在文件系统'%1'创建快照'%2'失败，快照保留天数'%3'，错误:'%4'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' create snapshot '%2' failed,expiration date: '%3',Error:'%4'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除快照'%1'成功
Bean.English: Destroy snapshot '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除快照'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Destroy snapshot '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 回滚快照'%1'成功
Bean.English: Rollback snapshot '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 回滚快照'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Rollback snapshot '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 在文件系统'%1'创建快照'%2'成功，快照保留天数'永久'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' create snapshot '%2' success,expiration date: 'forever'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 在文件系统'%1'创建快照'%2'失败，快照保留天数'永久'，错误:'%3'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' create snapshot '%2' failed,expiration date: 'forever',Error:'%3'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 获取文件系统列表失败，错误:'%1'
Bean.English: Get file system list failed,Error:'%1'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启自动快照成功，时间间隔:'%2'分钟，最大快照数:'%3'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' open auto snapshot success,time intervel:'%2',maxnum:'%3'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启自动快照失败，时间间隔:'%2'分钟，最大快照数:'%3'，错误:'%4'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' open auto snapshot failed,time intervel:'%2',maxnum:'%3',Error:'%4'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭自动快照并保留创建的自动快照成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close auto snapshot and save before created snapshot success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭自动快照并保留创建的自动快照失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close auto snapshot and save before created snapshot failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭自动快照并删除原有自动快照成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close auto snapshot and delete before created snapshot success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭自动快照并删除原有自动快照失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close auto snapshot and delete before created snapshot success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 获取文件系统'%1'手工快照列表失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Get manual snapshot from file system '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 获取文件系统'%1'自动快照列表失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Get auto snapshot from file system '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除过期手工快照'%1'成功
Bean.English: Destory out of date snapshot '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除过期手工快照'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Destory out of date snapshot '%1',Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启自动快照成功，时间间隔:'%2'分钟，最大快照数:'%3'，开启智能快照功能成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' open auto snapshot success,time intervel:'%2',maxnum:'%3'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启自动快照失败，时间间隔:'%2'分钟，最大快照数:'%3'，开启智能快照功能失败，错误:'%4'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' open auto snapshot failed,time intervel:'%2',maxnum:'%3',Error:'%4'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'配置同步参数失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1'configure synchronization failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 获取主机:'%1'，端口:'%2'的卷组信息失败，错误：'%3'
Bean.English: Get host '%1' ,port '%2' zpool infomation failed , Error:'%3'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'配置远程同步参数,目标主机IP:'%2',目标主机端口:'%3',目标主机文件系统:'%4',压缩级别:'%5'
Bean.English: On file system '%1'configure synchronization,IP:'%2',Port:'%3',Target ZFS:'%4',GzipLevel:'%5'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启远程同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' start remote synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启远程同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' start remote synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭远程同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close remote synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭远程同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close remote synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'远程同步失败,错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' remote synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'暂停远程同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' pause remote synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'暂停远程同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' pause remote synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'恢复远程同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' restore remote synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'恢复远程同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' restore remote synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'本地同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' local synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 获取目标文件系统'%1'信息失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Get target file system '%1' info failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启本地同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' start local synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'开启本地同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' start local synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭本地同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close local synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'关闭本地同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' close local synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'暂停本地同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' pause local synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'暂停本地同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' pause local synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'恢复本地同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' restore local synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'恢复本地同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' restore local synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'配置本地同步参数成功,目标文件系统:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1'configure synchronization success,Target ZFS:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'配置本地同步参数失败,目标文件系统:'%2',错误：'%3'
Bean.English: On file system '%1'configure synchronization failed,Target ZFS:'%2',Error:'%3'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'继续本地同步时目标文件系统数据不一致，自动回滚目标文件系统失败,错误：'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' resume local synchronization target server data not accordance,rollback target file system failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'继续远程同步时目标文件系统数据不一致，自动回滚目标文件系统失败,错误：'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' resume remote synchronization target server data not accordance,rollback target file system failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 响应源主机获取本机文件系统与卷组信息命令执行时失败,错误：'%1'
Bean.English: Get local ZFS pool and file system failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'同步用户用户组信息成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' synchronization user and user group infomation success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'同步用户用户组信息失败,错误：'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' synchronization user and user group infomation success failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 目标文件系统'%1'在目标端停止同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' stop synchronization

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'保存回滚成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1'save rollback success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'保存回滚失败,错误：'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1'save rollback failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'取消回滚成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1'cancal rollback success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'取消回滚失败,错误：'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1'cancal rollback failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'删除本地同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' delete local synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'删除本地同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' delete local synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'删除远程同步成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' delete remote synchronized success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'删除远程同步失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' delete remote synchronized failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'修改本地同步执行时间成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' modify local synchronized time success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'修改本地同步执行时间失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' modify local synchronized time failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'修改远程同步执行时间成功
Bean.English: On file system '%1' modify remote synchronized time success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 文件系统'%1'修改远程同步执行时间失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: On file system '%1' modify remote synchronized time failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 创建副本'%1'成功
Bean.English: Create copy '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 创建副本'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Create copy '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除副本'%1'成功
Bean.English: Delete copy '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除副本'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Delete copy '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 磁盘组'%1'修改快照保护成功，时间间隔:'%2'分钟，最大快照数:'%3'
Bean.English: On disk group '%1' open snapshot protect success,time intervel:'%2',maxnum:'%3'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 磁盘组'%1'修改快照保护失败，时间间隔:'%2'分钟，最大快照数:'%3'，错误:'%4'
Bean.English: On disk group '%1' open snapshot protect failed,time intervel:'%2',maxnum:'%3',Error:'%4'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 添加远程设备'%1'成功
Bean.English: Add remote device '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 添加远程设备'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Add remote device '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除远程设备'%1'成功
Bean.English: Delete remote device '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 删除远程设备'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Delete remote device '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 更新远程设备'%1'成功
Bean.English: Modify remote device '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 更新远程设备'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Modify remote device '%1' failed,Error:'%2'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 用户'%1'授权'%2'成功
Bean.English: Modify remote device '%1' '%2'success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.English: Modify remote device '%1' '%2'success'

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 回滚远程主机'%1'上的快照'%2'成功
Bean.English: Rollback snapshot '%2' on remote device '%1' success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 回滚远程主机'%1'上的快照'%2'失败，错误:'%3'
Bean.English: Rollback snapshot '%2' on remote device '%1',error:%3

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 远程回滚主机上的快照'%1'成功
Bean.English: Rollback snapshot '%1' on remote device success

Bean.Author: 王麒
Bean.Chinese: 远程回滚主机上的快照'%1'失败，错误:'%2'
Bean.English: Rollback snapshot '%1' on remote device,error:%2
